EmailTemplate.description: Entering the Corian® Quality Network - EN Version
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA QN Entering - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Signing the Corian® Quality Network contract
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Signing the Corian® Quality Network contract Dear {!Qualification__c.Contact__c},
We have received the request to make your company a Qualified Quality Network Member and are sending you herewith the link with your “DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network” contract.
May we kindly ask you to print out two copies of the “DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network” agreement; put your initials on each page of the contracts and stamp, sign and date page ..., before you sent them both back to the following address:
DuPont de Nemours (Belgium) BVBA Attn {!Qualification__c.Owner__c} Departement CORIAN® Building Innovations - KGB4 Antoon Spinoystraat 6 B-2800 Mechelen Belgium
Afterwards you will receive 1 copy back with some “DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network” supporting material.
In case of questions, do not hesitate to contact us.
Friendly Regards,
{!Qualification__c.Owner__c} DuPont Building Innovations – Surfaces Quality Network & Warranty Assistant Warranty Centre Corian® Email: BI-Warranty@dupont.com
www.corian.com We want to inform you that we collect your information to identify your business interests, provide you with products or services and offer a positive customer experience during business interactions. Your personal information (name, e-Mail, phone number, and other contact data) will be stored in chosen customer systems primarily hosted in the United States. This information may be shared within DuPont, its affiliates, partners, and selected third parties in other countries for the same purpose. In order to access, amend, delete or oppose to the processing of your information, use this link.
DuPont™ and Corian® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E. <?xml:namespace prefix = st1 />I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliates. The usage of logos, trademarks and registered trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company must be authorized by E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or by one of its affiliated companies.
